body_html:
@memeda @youngia , I follow the code but with slightly change and succeed:

mask_padding_zero_op = tf.scatter_update(lookup_table, 
                                         PADDING_ID, 
                                         tf.zeros([EMBEDDING_DIM,], dtype=DTYPE))
with tf.control_dependencies([mask_padding_zero_op]):
    # do embedding lookup...

body:
@memeda @youngia , I follow the code but with slightly change and succeed:
```
mask_padding_zero_op = tf.scatter_update(lookup_table, 
                                         PADDING_ID, 
                                         tf.zeros([EMBEDDING_DIM,], dtype=DTYPE))
with tf.control_dependencies([mask_padding_zero_op]):
    # do embedding lookup...
```
